T.query: select sh.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid, so.specialofferid from salesorderheader sh join salesorderdetail sod on sh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid join specialoffer so on sod.specialofferid = so.specialofferid

F.query: select sh.salesorderid, sod.salesorderdetailid, so.specialofferid from salesorderheader sh join salesorderdetail sod on sh.salesorderid = sod.salesorderid right join specialoffer so on sod.specialofferid = so.specialofferid
